title: Bug 18705: Excessive Flashing in Control Example
description: The report mentions excessive flashing in the Control Example without providing a reason.
OB: Upon running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, it is observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
EB: The expected behavior is for the Control Example to run smoothly without excessive flashing when resizing the window. However, the report doesn't specify the underlying issue for this flashing problem.
SR: To reproduce the issue, run the Control Example and resize the window in the vertical direction only. Observe the excessive flashing in all tabs of the TabFolder and Frames.
